name: Sakhi Social Enterprise Network

address: Behind Reliance Petrol Pump, Barshi Road

briefDescription: Sakhi Social Enterprise Network (SSEN) was established by Swayam Shikshan Prayog (SSP), a learning and development organization through 'self-education for empowerment', bringing women and communities from the margin to themainstream of development. The organization seeds entrepreneurship among underserved segments of society, through awareness, training and skill building programs. SSEN reaches out to rural communities through three flagship programs - School of Rural Entrepreneurship (E-School) for women micro entrepreneurs and School for Vocational skills and Placements (V-School), for youth - young boys and girls in low income families and School for Design and Business Implementation Plans(D-School) - for developing the business frame
